subject: Chemistry
question_text: Given below are two statements : Statement I : In group 13, the stability of +1 oxidation state increases down the group. Statement II : The atomic size of gallium is greater than that of aluminium. In the light of the above

options.text: (1) Both Statement I and Statement II are correct
(2) Statement I is incorrect but Statement II is correct
(3) Both Statement I and Statement II are incorrect
(4) Statement I is correct but Statement II is incorrect
